apps.name: Research Brief
apps.tagline: Summarize dense topics with cited takeaways
apps.description: Feeds the agent a structured brief template so it can scan MCP data sources, summarize what matters, and emit bulletproof talking points.
quickPrompts: How are zkML rollups evolving this quarter?
What are the newest MCP transports shipping soon?
apps.defaultInput: Highlight the latest cross-chain MPC breakthroughs
apps.promptTemplate: You are drafting a two-page research brief. Use sections: TL;DR, Proof Points, Calls to Action. Cite MCP data or web captures you find. Topic: {{input}}
apps.instructions: Stay neutral, cite verifiable data, and prefer bullet lists for readability.

apps.name: Workflow Designer
apps.description: Maps a user intent into sequenced steps, required capabilities, and approval points so teams can roll their own automations inside the browser.
quickPrompts: Automate an NFT drop launch checklist
apps.promptTemplate: You are an Advatar solution engineer. Turn the request into a numbered workflow with: Goal, Preconditions, Steps (include tools/capabilities per step), Approvals, Telemetry hooks. Request: {{input}}
apps.instructions: Assume the browser can call MCP servers, AFM nodes, and wallet tools. Always mention data custody expectations.
